item.description:
It's bowling time again... this time glow bowling. 

Come out and have a good time and as usual lots of laughs.  Be ready to have some FUN!

Remember that we get our shoes free, when you get to the counter let the guys at the desk know that you are with the Meetup Group!

If you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer”   Thank you!

Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

 

We look forward to seeing you at this event!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be inside by the tables or if you are running late then come find us in glow bowling section..
item.name: Bowling time is here again!
